column4: hallo any one here know how to fix wireless proplem in ubnutu 11.04
: intel i think dell wireless 1395 wlan mini-card
What is it called in the output of lspci ?
lspci is a command that lists hardware connected to your pc.  It is a command you run in the terminal
: sorry i now using ms windows 7 because i install ubuntu 10.10 because i need wireless
You need to be running ubuntu to debug ubuntu
It is not a simple thing to fix unfortunately
: so i have to use ubuntu 10.10 until ubuntu 11.10 coming and i hope they will fix this proplem
It probably can be fixed.  But you have to boot it in order to figure out how to fix it.
What card do you have listed in lspci ?
: i told you i'm now using ms windows 7
and I told you.  You need to boot Ubuntu!
: ok but how i can conect to you throw here too
You'll have to go back and forth I'm afraid.  I suggest getting a second machine.  I have to go now though :(
